title: 10 years of Riot skin but no icon
body: I got the skin for two days now, but I haven't got any skin, shouldn't the skin and the icon be gifted at the same time?

replies.body: They're send out individually and it will take a bit of time for all of the gifts to send out to every eligible account.  You can stay updated at the [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-), but just hang tight until this is all wrapped up!
